citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
Inside the cabinet where medications are stored, there were 5 expired medications.
--Oxytocin injectable expired Sept 2022
--SMT 800/160 tablets expired Dec 2021
--Metronidazole 250 mg tablets expired 31 Aug 2021
--Triple Antibiotic/Pain relief ointment expired Aug 2017
--Triple Antibiotic ointment expired June 2019
Use of expired medications is not an appropriate method to treat, prevent, or control diseases and parasites. The expired
medications may no longer be the potency needed for the intended medical treatment and may even be harmful.
All expired medication should be removed once expired so they are not inadvertently used on the animals.
Correct by: Oct. 20, 2022. NOTE: Licensee disposed of these medications during inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2)  Repeat
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
Inside the cabinet where medications are stored, there were 5 expired medications. 
--Oxytocin injectable expired Sept 2022 
--SMT 800/160 tablets expired Dec 2021 
--Metronidazole  250 mg tablets expired 31 Aug 2021 
--Triple Antibiotic/Pain relief ointment expired Aug 2017 
--Triple Antibiotic ointment expired June 2019 
 
Use of expired medications is not an appropriate method to treat, prevent, or control diseases and parasites.  The expired 
medications may no longer be the potency needed for the intended medical treatment and may even be harmful. 
All expired medication should be removed once expired so they are not inadvertently used on the animals. 
Correct by: Oct. 20, 2022.   NOTE:  Licensee disposed of these medications during inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
